messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Labor Tomb Sierra. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a swarm of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.
